document.full_text: the chief suspect in last week's attack in morocco's top tourist destination disguised himself as a guitar-carrying hippie when he entered a cafe and planted two bombs, killing 16 people, an official source said on friday.
document.title: morocco cafe bomb suspect posed as a hippie
lines_and_colors: the chief suspect in last week's attack in morocco's top tourist destination disguised himself as a guitar-carrying hippie when he entered a cafe and planted two bombs, killing 16 people, an official source said on friday.
